text: "Talk About the Passion" is a 1983 song by R.E.M. and is the second single from their debut studio album Murmur. It was released in Europe and failed to follow up the success of Radio Free Europe. ==Track listing== All songs written by Bill Berry, Peter Buck, Mike Mills and Michael Stipe unless otherwise indicated. #"Talk About the Passion" – 3:24 #"Shaking Through" – 4:30 #"Carnival of Sorts (Boxcars)" – 3:55 #"1,000,000" – 3:07 == References == Category:1983 songs Category:R.E.M. songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Jangle pop songs
title: Talk About the Passion
